Table 1. 3D detection performance of Car category on KITTI official test set and validation set. The 1 st , 2 nd and 3 rd place are color 
coded. * indicates using the pre-trained depth estimator DORN [9]. Wang et al. [38] pointed out that the training data of DORN overlaps 
with KITTI-Object validation data, causing the 3D detectors to overfit. We use gray to indicate the values affected by overfitting.

time of DORN [9]). 
For Pedestrian and Cyclist, we present the detection per-
formance in Table 2. Our method (with LiDAR supervi-
sion) achieves the best performance in Pedestrian detection, 
yet underperforms in Cyclist detection, presumably due to 
inadequate training samples.
